Create and publish offer version Snapshot

data.instruction: Update offer publish/lifecycle flags so customer actors can discover it.
data.expectedResult: Offer appears as published/active and can be returned in customer-facing list queries.

requestBody.title: Customer two performs concurrent booking attempt API Trace

data.instruction: Create customer account/session and verify customer can browse published offers.
data.expectedResult: Customer session established and offer discovery succeeds.

data.instruction: Upload snapshots for critical steps and submit final markdown report summarizing pass/fail and discovered gaps.
data.expectedResult: Run has persisted report + snapshots in project directory and indexed metadata in DB.

requestBody.failureMessage: owner-configure-demand-pricing: Demand pricing capability is not exposed as API tools yet.

resultPayload.note: Step blocked: owner-configure-demand-pricing: Demand pricing capability is not exposed as API tools yet.

evidence.error: owner-configure-demand-pricing: Demand pricing capability is not exposed as API tools yet.

data.instruction: Set demand pricing rules (for example peak-hour/holiday overrides) and verify they can be applied to bookable offers.
data.expectedResult: Demand pricing policy exists and can influence offer/booking totals.
data.failureMessage: owner-configure-demand-pricing: Demand pricing capability is not exposed as API tools yet.

resultPayload.note: Step blocked: owner-configure-demand-pricing: Demand pricing capability is not exposed as API tools yet.

evidence.error: owner-configure-demand-pricing: Demand pricing capability is not exposed as API tools yet.

data.instruction: Upload snapshots for critical steps and submit final markdown report summarizing pass/fail and discovered gaps.
data.expectedResult: Run has persisted report + snapshots in project directory and indexed metadata in DB.
